channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped tipped garden and other waste, 19th September
item.description:
VARIOUS types of waste have been fly tipped amongst the bushes, including a fire extinguisher a tonne bag of garden waste pieces of timber a bag of sawdust…

item.title: Dog poo on queens rd peckham, 19th September
item.description:
Dog poo from just past sainsbury's all the way down to the crossing before queens road train station! Absolutely disgusting! Making the school run a horrendous situation! Spreads diseases! And there are multiple bits of poo, most probably by the same dog! People need to be fined! Please can this be cleaned up ASAP
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 131, Queen's Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Front of Costa coffee, 19th September
item.description:
Dumped bags, and a blue wooden palet Can you collect all this bags efectivelly over nights, so morning are streets clean? You need y new system and refres. Every where is mess, literatura on floors, bin.bags, dirty....where is water clean car for streats and pavements?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rye Lane, Peckham, London

item.title: Duke of Wellington pub’s broken glass on public pavement, 19th September
item.description:
This is a recurring problem caused by the Duke of Wellington pub’s careless approach to clearing up the broken glass left on the public footpath from their business. WCC’s street cleaner is sweeping it up this morning. That is not his job. The pub needs to clear up all their rubbish including broken glass or lose their licence to operate outside. WCC - please take action to get this message across to the pub’s owners and management.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Wyndham Place, Marylebone, London
Report on FixMyStreet
